text: is a Japanese actor, voice actor and narrator from Saitama Prefecture, Japan. ==Biography== Kakegawa was born on October 11, 1959 in Saitama Prefecture. He graduated from Waseda University.Talent Who's Who in Japan, Section 92, VIP Times Inc., 2012, After university he primarily worked in local government, until he decided to quit his job and become a voice actor. He debuted in the television anime Saint Seiya.Voice actor who 25 people and Akira Kamiya - that wanted to be a voice actor everyone (1993) [Japanese Import] Kakegawa hid his change in career from his parents until they discovered his deception after seeing his name in the credits for Gegege no Kitaro. ==Filmography== ===Anime=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
